data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Mahisagar, Gujarat, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mahisagar, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Mahisagar you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: the county of Mahisagar has (about) 564 people who know Jesus, 622 people who know about him culturally, and 50,113 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Mahisagar, Gujarat, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Tai people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Tai people know you.
Father, help the 564 believers in Mahisagar to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Mahisagar, Gujarat, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Mahisagar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Mahisagar
location.people_groups_list: Bhil Dhanka, Rathawa, Koli Patelia, Behlim, Kandoi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bhil Dhanka (80,000), Rathawa (650,000), Koli Patelia (463,000), Behlim (8,200), Kandoi (2,600)
